# Data and feature engineering

## Universe and period
- Tokens (≥$50m mcap; ≥3 months listed), 12-h bars; target `return_72h`.

## Cleaning, alignment, imputation
- Timestamp alignment; missing bin handling; imputation masks.

## Feature set
- **Momentum** (logret_12h/36h, RSI/PROC/Stoch).
- **Volatility** (realised vol, ATR, Parkinson).
- **Liquidity/microstructure** (spread, depth, OBV, price_volume).
- **On-chain** (Δ wallets, tx counts).
- **Cross-asset** (SOL, ETH).

## EDA highlights
- Return skew/heavy tails; regime markers; missingness summary.
